device_models: HTC One M8 phones, Samsung Nexus 10 tablets
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
evaluation: Quality measurements (e.g., accuracy of tracking); Technical evaluation (e.g., runtime, roundtrip)
contribution_desc: A robust 3D spatial tracking system which leverages Bluetooth Low Energy, inaudible acoustic signals, and inertial sensing to support cross-device interactions.
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Location 3D; Orientation; Tracking devices only
tracking_reliability: loud sounds or obstructed microphones and large distances would cause acoustic signals undetectable
tracking_tech: Acoustic signals; IMU; Bluetooth Low Energy; Standalone
